import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { BiLike } from 'react-icons/bi'; import { BsCamera, BsThreeDots } from 'react-icons/bs'; import { FaRegCommentDots } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { IoIosShareAlt } from 'react-icons/io'; import { AiFillLike } from 'react-icons/ai'; import useLikes from '../../../../hooks/useLikes'; import useAuth from '../../../../hooks/useAuth'; const UserPost = (props) => { const { _id, name, date, postDesc, image, like } = props; const { user } = useAuth(); const { handleLike, likeDetail } = useLikes(); const handleLikeUpdate = id => { handleLike() const likeDetail = { likedPersonName: user?.displayName, likedPersonEmail: user?.email, like: like } console.log(likeDetail); fetch(`http://localhost:5000/posts/${id}`, { method: 'PUT', headers: { 'content-type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(likeDetail) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data); }) } return (
{name}

Published: {date}

{postDesc}

{like}

0 Comments

0 Shares
